org.eclipse.debug.core.model.IStreamMonitor

Packages that use IStreamMonitor
Package
Description
org.eclipse.debug.core
Provides support for launching programs, breakpoint management, expression management, and debug events.
org.eclipse.debug.core.model
Defines interfaces for debug model elements, source lookup, and launching.
org.eclipse.debug.ui.console
Provides a set of interfaces and classes for rendering and annotating text in the debug console.

    void
    IStreamListener.streamAppended(String text, IStreamMonitor monitor)
    Notifies this listener that text has been appended to the given stream monitor.

  • Uses of IStreamMonitor in org.eclipse.debug.core.model

    Subinterfaces of IStreamMonitor in org.eclipse.debug.core.model
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    IBinaryStreamMonitor
    A variant of IStreamMonitor which does not touch the received content and pass it as bytes instead of strings.
    interface 
    IFlushableStreamMonitor
    A stream monitor who's contents can be flushed.
    Methods in org.eclipse.debug.core.model that return IStreamMonitor
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    IStreamMonitor
    IStreamsProxy.getErrorStreamMonitor()
    Returns a monitor for the error stream of this proxy's process, or null if not supported.
    IStreamMonitor
    IStreamsProxy.getOutputStreamMonitor()
    Returns a monitor for the output stream of this proxy's process, or null if not supported.
